MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:30pm due to a damaged underground cable outside 73 Mainholm Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00pm for the majority of customers and 9:00pm for all remaining customers. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:07pm on Friday, 16 April 2021
